Articles.Content: How do I get those big images that people have in their posts? I'm doing a challenge and I want to have my images visible on the OP.

Make the big images, and then post it on a site called imgur. Then, you hit the copy button for BBcode, and then you paste the image where you want it to be.

Your talking about screenshots right?

Take screenshots, locate screenshots, go to www.imgur.com and make an account, upload the pictures, copy the "BB code" link, paste to forums.

Take a screenshot by pressing F1.

Screenshots can be found in KspFolder/Screenshots.

Upload to imgur.com.

On the right, copy the text under "BBCode (message boards & forums)".

Insert into post, should look something like [noparse][/noparse].

Profit!
